component.name: Immersed Desktop Agent
component.summary: Used to stream your (virtual) monitors to the Immersed VR app

description.p: Immersed is a productivity focused spatial computing application for various virtual reality headsets; and this app is provides the desktop agent that allows you to stream your computer's screens into the spatial environment.

NOTE: This app is an unofficial Flatpak distribution based on the official upstream AppImage. This repackaging is not supported by Immersed, and bugs should not be reported to Immersed unless they can be reproduced in the official AppImage client.
